intro.title: Signals & Privacy
intro.description: Nirakara uses lightweight cookies to power the cart, account area, and performance analytics. We never sell or rent data, and we do not use third-party ad trackers.

sections.title: What We Track
sections.body: Session cookies keep your cart and account form progress intact. Analytics cookies (Matomo, self-hosted) capture anonymous page performance data. No third-party advertising pixels are used.

sections.title: How Long We Store Data
sections.body: Session cookies expire after closing the browser. Preference cookies that record consent choices last for 6 months. Analytics data is purged after 13 months.

sections.title: Managing Preferences
sections.body: Use the banner or the buttons below to update consent at any time. Blocking cookies may impact cart persistence and login functionality.
